alert.note: Alert for Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Upson and north central Taylor Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Carsonville, or 11 miles south of Thomaston, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Yatesville, Lincoln Park, Logtown, Salem, Redbone Crossroads, Hannahs Mill and Carsonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
